content:
Hello, I want to make a script that takes lean project and specific file in the project and for every row reads and save the results of the interactive assitance. In the end I need for aevery requsted lean file, another file that contains the results of each line.
Of course I can record my scren and use some tools for moving the mouse and reading the results. but there is an easier way to do it? maby something like API?
It sounds like you're looking either for something like leanink (if this is for interactive use), or any one of the suggestions in #Machine Learning for Theorem Proving.
Oh, I completely missed that streem. Thanks a lot!
Shimon Cohen has marked this topic as resolved.

A very short answer: you need to generate and parse the Infotree objects. It's all there, but pretty annoying to get to at the moment. You can look at my infotree branch for some helper functions, but that branch still needs a lot of work.
